name: addressbookrecovery
short_description:
Address book recovery software provides influential and safe contacts recovery Solution to easily recover Outlook Contacts. It also provides opportunity to save recovered contacts into various formats such as : PST, VCF, CSV  formats. User can easily export contacts to lotus notes (NSF), MS Outlook (PST file), Outlook express (Wab file) format without facing more complications. This tool provides a finest solution to fix Outlook contacts from damaged address book.

Exceptional Features of Address Book Recovery software are given below:
 It helps you to recover deleted, lost or inaccessible Outlook Contacts.
 By using this, user can save recovered contacts into CSV and VCF format
 This tool easily recovers entire OST/PST file contacts and it shows preview of all recovered contacts.
 Provides Search option, if you want to check any contact weather it has been completely recovered or not. 
View more: http://www.addressbookrecovery.com/retrieve-outlook-contacts.html
summary: Recover Deleted Contacts with Address Book Recovery Software
